Kris and I will be at BlogWalk Seattle. See ya there!

From Mathemagenic: learning and KM insights - Saturday, July 16, 2005.:

QUOTE

We were cooking it a bit on the background, but I guess it's time: BlogWalkSeattle is planned for 2 September and I'm very glad that Nancy White joins for facilitating it.

This time the theme is (un)conference? blogging?

We are going to focus on parallels, differences and synergies between blogging and face-to-face gatherings.

UNQUOTE
